description: Creates a new request and notifies the ilabs@uk.ibm.com email address.

params.name: start
params.description: The time (in ms) of the start of the request

params.name: end
params.description: The time (in ms) of the end of the request

params.name: description
params.description: A description of the nature of the request

params.name: businessNeed
params.description: The justification for making the request from a business need perspective
